spiritsExplanation: The workout titled 'Whole Body Pilates' indicates a focus on whole-body movements typical of Pilates, suggesting a 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit due to its emphasis on coordination and smooth movements. The playlist features upbeat pop songs, enhancing the rhythmic aspect. The description mentions it is conducted in a setting with views of Seville on a rainy day, which infers an integration of the environment into the session, aligning with an 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit even though the activity is 'on the mat.' This implies the use of the cultural or environmental setting rather than physical exploration. The absence of intensity cues rules out 'High-Energy & Intense' and 'Soothing & Restorative' as major spirits.
